Name: Sex Adventures - The Office Slut
About the game: About the game A visual novel about a hot sales agent who faked her sales reports to get a bonus. Once her colleague finds out about it, he starts blackmailing her. Visual Novel Description Cindy is a hot sales agent working for a successful real estate company. Blonde, tall, and with enviable shapes, all she has to do all day is to look good and conclude contracts by phone. Even though her boss didn't want to hire her initially, after looking at her cleavage once more, she gave her a chance. Now sheâ€™s competing for the annual bonus, but behind her outstanding results lies a little secret. During the year, she managed to falsify some sales reports, hoping that no one would ever check on them. Her biggest competitor, Lucas, eventually finds out about her maneuvers and starts taking advantage of her situation. How will Cindy solve this problem? Will she be able to keep her job? How far is she willing to go? Let's find out together. Features: - Over 100 HD quality renders - Animations
